name: Millefeuille - [The Witness fangame prototype]
description:
/ ! \  PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR AN OPTIMAL EXPERIENCE  / ! \

I added an HTML version so you can preview the game before downloading it, but if you want to actually play through it the downloaded version is highly recommended.

I also recommend playing with the volume on, although it is not needed to solve puzzles.

---

I'm a big fan of the game The Witness by Jonathan Blow and his team, so I decided to make a Witness-like for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam. I had a lot of fun working on this project, and I have a lot of ideas for other puzzles, game mechanics and secrets I would like to add to the game. 

Feel free to get in touch if you'd like to see that happen. Your feedback will be really appreciated ~~

---

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move;
  • Space to interact with computers;
  • Mouse to solve puzzles;
  • Escape to exit a puzzle without solving it.

---

Credits:

  • Art: 2D Magic Lands by Szadi art.
  • Music (courtesy of Uppbeat): 
    • Little Utopia by Locran, XRYURV8KPBSSFZUB
    • Capitoline by Floor Model, VJNKUWQJEB1KRVOI
    • Hey Look Up by Cutesy Chamber Ensemble, SDLTFAL1OD8XALYJ
    • No Mystery by Cutesy Chamber Ensemble, KDFXJTYZ2BBGRNFK
  • SFX from ZapSplat.

---

I made this game on my own in around 48h for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam, with the theme "Elephant in the Room". 
The puzzles in this game are also inspired by Artless's Understand, be sure to check it out!
Special thanks to Limuy Asien for play-testing and choosing the music, and to Bryce for helping me with a nasty recursive function.

Thank you for playing!
